title: Introduction to chess
description: This course introduces the fundamentals of chess in a clear and engaging way. You learn how each piece moves, the rules of the game, and basic strategies to develop the board. Real games and master strategies demonstrate concepts. Lessons include practice games,  opening principles, forks and pins, and checkmate patterns.
